topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ab8e8663687268b1ae0400#post_53ab8e8663687268b1ae0400
I'm thinking it will likely be more along the lines of one person making the game, probably to cater to their specific tastes and probably for free just because they want to make a porn game because they are a goddamn saint, and then the mods flowing in afterwards.

Again though I must point out that no VR devices have really been mass released yet. Personally I'm still more than a little skeptical about the whole concept, and I know there are others like me.

Ultimately time will tell.

"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ab909763687267ec740600#post_53ab909763687267ec740600
[bq="trashboat"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ab903863687268b1670500#post_53ab903863687268b1670500
We G Gundam now?[/bq]
I understood that reference and yes that is what I mean.  Once the costs are down enough build cities out on the ocean then leave all old cities to decay.  Just don't even bother with demolishing the old cities, just let them rot.  It's the perfect asshole plan; leave the old cities to decay into slums and eventually collapse and in the new cities whenever a building or such needs to be demolished just sink it instead.
